attributes.background: Water is valuable resource but it student be expensive to use. It also effect health and hygiene and day to day life. Tight water bill might effect life style people might  cut shows and stop flushing  toilets.

rejection.details:
It's up to water companies, not the Government or Parliament, to decide whether to install water meters and ask customers to use them.

You can find out more about the law on this here:

http://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/CBP-7342/CBP-7342.pdf
